message: I have always found that it is very useful to find out who has payed for the research. Dustin, I am still not sure why you are so passionate in your dislike of PETA.
Plenty of people behind that movement are intent on making a difference. Not in making a name for themselves.

I don't care if 42% don't agree with it or don't want it!! The truth is that a ban on plastic bags is what is best for the planet. Austin Tx has already banned plastic bags. I don't understand why Washington and other parts of the west coast are so far behind the conservatives on this environmental issue.
